dev.simmons.data

Interface AccountDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PostgresAccountDAO

    public interface AccountDAO
    A Database Access Object handling manipulation of the Account table.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account createAccount(Account account)
      Persist an account into the database.
      boolean deleteAccount(Account account)
      Removes an account record from the database.
      boolean deleteAccount(int id)
      Removes an account record from the database.
      Account getAccount(int id)
      Retrieve an account from the database
      boolean updateAccount(Account newAccount)
      Update an account with the values passed in.
      boolean updateAccounts(Account... accounts)
      A batch update given a variable number of accounts.

    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        Account createAccount(Account account)
        Persist an account into the database.
        Parameters:
        account - The account to persist in the database.
        Returns:
        The account as it exists in the database

      • getAccount

        Account getAccount(int id)
        Retrieve an account from the database
        Parameters:
        id - The account_id of the account to retrieve.
        Returns:
        If an account with account_id exists, the account. Null, otherwise.

      • updateAccount

        boolean updateAccount(Account newAccount)
        Update an account with the values passed in.
        Parameters:
        newAccount - The account with the updated values.
        Returns:
        True if the update goes successfully, false otherwise.

      • updateAccounts

        boolean updateAccounts(Account... accounts)
        A batch update given a variable number of accounts. WIP!
        Parameters:
        accounts - The variable number of accounts to update.
        Returns:
        True if the update goes successfully, false otherwise.

      • deleteAccount

        boolean deleteAccount(Account account)
        Removes an account record from the database.
        Parameters:
        account - The account object containing the account_id to delete.
        Returns:
        True if the deletion is successful, false otherwise.

      • deleteAccount

        boolean deleteAccount(int id)
        Removes an account record from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The account_id to delete.
        Returns:
        True if the deletion is successful, false otherwise.
